Bardell's hierarchical functions

Number of terms: 40

t1*(xi^3/4 - 3*xi/4 + 1/2)
r1*(xi^3/8 - xi^2/8 - xi/8 + 1/8)
t2*(-xi^3/4 + 3*xi/4 + 1/2)
r2*(xi^3/8 + xi^2/8 - xi/8 - 1/8)
xi^4/8 - xi^2/4 + 1/8
xi^5/8 - xi^3/4 + xi/8
7*xi^6/48 - 5*xi^4/16 + 3*xi^2/16 - 1/48
3*xi^7/16 - 7*xi^5/16 + 5*xi^3/16 - xi/16
